item.title: Understanding Node.js: Architecture and Internal Workings
item.description: Node.js enables efficient server apps in JavaScript, using a non-blocking, event-driven model. With Googleâ€™s V8 engine and Libuv, it excels at handling asynchronous I/O, ideal for real-time, scalable applications. This article dives into its architecture and internal mechanics.
